title: Ideal circumstances to opt for weekly car rental in Singapore (Thomas Chia)
text: Jul 16, 2015 #1 Trips to travel around the countryWhen you want to set out to explore the fun options in Singapore, it would be best to rent a car. If you rely on the public transport system, you will end up wasting a lot of time and money. If you make reservations in advance for car rental Singapore, you will get to understand the benefits right from the time you reach the airport. You will be able to move out of the airport easily as the rental provider can arrange for the airport transfers upon your request. You will also be able to travel around the city with ease from the very first day of your trip. The country is loaded with amazing entertainment options. If you are traveling to the country on a short trip, renting a car would be quite essential to manage your time well. If you are on a family trip or with friends, you will be able to visit all popular tourist spots in the country and spend ample time enjoying the fun options if you choose weekly car hire Singapore.#2 To enjoy a Singapore-Malaysia tripSingapore and Malaysia share the boundary, as you all know. If you want to have some extra fun during your trip to Singapore, you should try including the amazing tourist spots in Malaysia on your trip schedule. You can do it with ease if you go for the weekly car rental option. There are many rental providers that offer budget car hire Singapore. You will be able to choose a car of your choice and set out on a road trip across the border with ease. The traveling time would be less than 6 hours and you will be able to enjoy plenty of amazing sights on your way too. Driving across the causeway would also be a splendid experience. You should however check with the rental company and mention your need to drive to Malaysia in order to get a vehicle that can be used for such drives.#3 Trips to serve business needsSingapore is a very renowned tourist destination and is also an equally important business hub. Aspiring entrepreneurs and seasoned businessmen are offered great opportunities. If you are traveling to Singapore to serve your business needs, hiring a car for a week would be the best option before you. You will be able to travel around the country in a timely manner and meet your prospective clients and customers if you choose to rent a car. In order to meet different clients at various locations in the country with ease, weekly rental would be the most economic option. Traveling by bus or train and then walking to the main venue for the rendezvous would not look good when you're on a business trip. If you're traveling on behalf of your company, you can definitely ask your employer to check out the corporate offers available on weekly car rentals in the country. You will be able to drive around in premium cars and add a good amount of pleasure to your business trip when you make use of this option!
